Package HW1

Class Company

  • java.lang.Object
    • HW1.Company
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdminInterface, CostumerInterface
    public class Company
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdminInterface, CostumerInterface
    Company Class for hold and doing all adding,removing stuff. Implements AdminInterface, Employee Interface and CostumerInterface
